code: import React from"react";import{Modal,Button,Form}from"react-bootstrap";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function EditNotebookModal(_ref){let{show,handleClose,notebookData,setNotebookData,handleSave}=_ref;const isEditing=(notebookData===null||notebookData===void 0?void 0:notebookData.id)!==undefined;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Modal,{show:show,onHide:handleClose,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal.Header,{closeButton:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal.Title,{children:isEditing?"Edit Notebook":"Create Notebook"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal.Body,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form.Group,{controlId:"formNotebookName",className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Label,{children:"Title"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Control,{type:"text",value:notebookData.notebookName,onChange:e=>setNotebookData({...notebookData,notebookName:e.target.value})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form.Group,{controlId:"formNotes",className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Label,{children:"Notes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Control,{as:"textarea",rows:3,value:notebookData.notes,onChange:e=>setNotebookData({...notebookData,notes:e.target.value})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form.Group,{controlId:"formResolution",className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Label,{children:"Resolution"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Control,{type:"text",value:notebookData.resolution,onChange:e=>setNotebookData({...notebookData,resolution:e.target.value})})]})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Modal.Footer,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"secondary",onClick:handleClose,children:"Cancel"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"primary",onClick:handleSave,children:isEditing?"Save Changes":"Create Notebook"})]})]});}export default EditNotebookModal;
